title: Diamond Detective
description:
OH NO! The precious jewels of Gemopolis have been stolen! The commissioner requests your help to recover the stolen gems, collect clues, and solve the mysterious heists! Game play is a race against time - you must make long chains of "same type" glittery gems to fill the jewel vault before the thief escapes. The longer the gem-chains, the faster the jewel vault meter will rise.
